user_profile.name: Sofia Morales
user_profile.description: Sofia, a 28-year-old from Mexico, has a solid background in technology, which she leverages in her role as a project coordinator. Known for her reserved demeanor, she approaches challenges rationally and with great patience, making her well-suited for arranging home modifications for the elderly. Sofia is motivated by a deep respect for family values and believes that creating safe environments for her loved ones enhances their quality of life.

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Facilitating independence for elderly with mobility issues
Creating a comfortable living environment for visitors with physical limitations
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local home improvement store or online marketplaces
additional_requirements: Incorporation of family preferences and assessments
Potential future modifications for evolving needs
